SEARCH
Module UsefulSchoolPortal
Package objects

Class SchoolClass

java.lang.Object
objects.SchoolClass
public class SchoolClass extends Object
The SchoolClass class is a representation of a class in a school system. It has many essential fields for a course as well as files that hold data for the class.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Santillan

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SchoolClass(String name, int block, int gradingMethod, int schoolID)
    This constructor builds a new class, as the ID is randomized.
    SchoolClass(String name, int block, int gradingMethod, int schoolID, int classID)
    This constructor builds an existing class, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user.

  • Constructor Details

    • SchoolClass

      public SchoolClass(String name, int block, int gradingMethod, int schoolID)
      This constructor builds a new class, as the ID is randomized. All other fields are set by the program parameters from the user.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      block - Given block
      gradingMethod - Given grading method
      schoolID - Given school ID

    • SchoolClass

      public SchoolClass(String name, int block, int gradingMethod, int schoolID, int classID)
      This constructor builds an existing class, as the ID along with the other fields are set by the program parameters from the user. The files are instantiated and set up in this method.
      Parameters:
      name - Given name
      block - Given block
      gradingMethod - Given grading method
      schoolID - Given school ID
      classID - Given class ID

    • modifyExistingAssignment

      public void modifyExistingAssignment(int assignmentID, String name, String weightCategory)
      The modifyexistingAssignment method modifies an existing assignment by searching for its ID and modifying the line with that ID on the file. This method is for assignments with weight grading.
      Parameters:
      assignmentID - The assignment ID
      name - The given name
      weightCategory - The given weight category

    • modifyExistingAssignment

      public void modifyExistingAssignment(int assignmentID, String name, int points)
      The modifyexistingAssignment method modifies an existing assignment by searching for its ID and modifying the line with that ID on the file. This method is for assignments with points grading.
      Parameters:
      assignmentID - The assignment ID
      name - The given name
      points - The given points count

    • modifyExistingAssignment

      public void modifyExistingAssignment(int assignmentID, String name)
      The modifyexistingAssignment method modifies an existing assignment by searching for its ID and modifying the line with that ID on the file. This method is for assignments with percents grading.
      Parameters:
      assignmentID - The assignment ID
      name - The given name

    • deleteAssignment

      public void deleteAssignment(int assignmentID)
      The deleteAssignment method deletes an assignment by assignment ID.
      Parameters:
      assignmentID - The ID of the assignment to remove

    • deleteAllAssignments

      public void deleteAllAssignments()
      The deleteAllAssignments method removes all the assignments from the assignments list.

    • setWeights

      public boolean setWeights(ArrayList<String> givenCategories, ArrayList<Integer> givenPercents)
      The setWeights method sets the weights for the class. Weights require a list of categories and a list of percents.
      Parameters:
      givenCategories - The list of categories
      givenPercents - The list of percents
      Returns:
      Whether the change went smoothly

    • getAllAverages

      public ArrayList<Double> getAllAverages()
      The getAllAverages method returns the average grade of every student in the class.
      Returns:
      The average grade of every student in the class

    • getIndividualStudentAssignmentGrades

      public ArrayList<Double> getIndividualStudentAssignmentGrades(int studentID)
      The getIndividualStudentAssignmentGrades method gets an individual's grade for every assignment in the class.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The student ID
      Returns:
      The grade for every assignment available

    • getAverage

      public double getAverage(int studentID)
      The getAverage method returns the average grade based on the grades of all assignments. For weight categories without an assignment, the program reassigns percents equally to make the grade realistic.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The student ID
      Returns:
      The overall average

    • setGrades

      public void setGrades(int assignmentID, ArrayList<Double> grades)
      The setGrades method sets the grades for a particular assignment.
      Parameters:
      assignmentID - The assignment ID
      grades - The grades to set to
